title: "Maumee Mesocosm Community Analysis"
author: "Jordyn Stoll"
date: "3/20/2018"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
setwd("~/Desktop/USGS Project/")
MaumeeMesoComData <- read.csv("~/Desktop/USGS Project/MaumeeMesoComData.csv")
plot(Microcystis.spp.~Treatment, data=MaumeeMesoComData, main='Microcystis Abundance to Nutrient Treatment', ylab='Microcystis % Abundance')

```

To look at the effect of the nutrient treatments on Microcystis abundance...

```{r cars}
MicrocystisANOVA<-aov(Microcystis.spp.~Treatment, data=MaumeeMesoComData)
summary(MicrocystisANOVA)
TukeyHSD(MicrocystisANOVA)
```
## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
